title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 438.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 438.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

Subdivision 6 of section
156
of the

Executive Law, as amended by chapter 615 of the Laws of 2006, empowers the

State Fire Administrator to plan, coordinate, and provide training related to
fire and arson prevention and control for firefighters, both paid and
volunteer, and related governmental officers and employees. Subdivision 6
directs the Office of Fire Prevention and Control to adopt rules and
regulations relating to such training, including but not limited to training
standards used, the process by which training hours will be allocated to
counties, and the establishment of a uniform procedure for counties to request
and the Office and Fire Prevention and Control to provide additional training
hours. This Part implements these requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
438.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
